<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 451, 761, 466]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 467, 808, 482]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 499, 482, 512]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 515, 363, 528]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 530, 483, 544]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 562, 466, 575]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 577, 666, 606]]<|/det|>
